summary:
New career goal: be someone's anchor.  Well, maybe not a big anchor, maybe a buoy or a small lighthouse?  But yeah, be there for someone to rely on when there's pressure.

Reading about people devaluing your work and what to do about it, by @mekkaokereke https://mekka-tech.com/posts/2018-08-09-the-difficulty-anchor/
